thread.title: Biden's Firm Stand: No Retreat from Global Affairs | Politics

author: Devdiscourse News Desk
title: Biden's Firm Stand: No Retreat from Global Affairs | Politics
text: Biden's Firm Stand: No Retreat from Global Affairs U.S. President Joe Biden reaffirmed America's commitment to global involvement and support for Ukraine. In a firm statement at the NATO summit, he emphasized that a strong NATO alliance is vital for U.S. security and assured that his leadership will not waver from these responsibilities. [Devdiscourse News Desk](/devdiscourse-stories)| Washington DC | Updated: 12-07-2024 05:14 IST | Created: 12-07-2024 05:14 IST - Country: - United States U.S. President Joe Biden vowed on Thursday that the United States "cannot retreat from the world" and promised that under his leadership, Washington will maintain its support for Ukraine. Speaking at a news conference wrapping up the NATO summit, Biden reinforced the importance of a strong NATO alliance for American security. The President's remarks come amid heightened global tensions, underlining his administration's commitment to fostering international alliances. (Disclaimer: With inputs from agencies.) Advertisement
